languages.text: {n}Слишком удачное стечение обстоятельств — представитель власти лично прибывает в Теневые Кварталы сразу после того, как Джай возвращает себе законную добычу. Похоже, охрана донесла по воксу о проблемах с грузом. И не кому попало, а доверителю самого наместника. Владайм Токара изначально знал о грузе и планировал присвоить его себе, а при случае еще избавиться от Джай. Вот она — грязная борьба хладных торговцев. Если бы не ваша случайная сделка в баре, у него вполне могло получиться.{/n}

{n}It is too great a coincidence that the Liege's representative should arrive in the Shadow Quarters just after Jae has recovered her rightful spoils. It seems that the guards reported the problems with the shipment over the vox, and not to just anyone, but to the Liege's personal agent. Vladaym Tocara knew about the shipment from the start and planned to take it for himself, and get rid of Jae if he could. Behold — the grubby, underhanded struggle between Cold Traders. And had it not been for your impromptu deal struck in the bar, Vladaym might have succeeded.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Слишком удачное стечение обстоятельств — представитель власти лично прибывает в Теневые Кварталы сразу после того, как Джай возвращает себе законную добычу. Похоже, охрана донесла по воксу о проблемах с грузом. И не кому попало, а доверителю самого наместника. Владайм Токара изначально знал о грузе и планировал присвоить его себе, а при случае еще избавиться от Джай. Вот она — грязная борьба хладных торговцев. Если бы не ваша случайная сделка в баре, у него вполне могло получиться.{/n}

languages.text: {n}这样的时机实在是太巧了。婕伊刚刚拿到她应得的货物，总督的代表就赶到了阴影区。看起来，似乎是守卫通过音阵频道报告了这批货物的状况，而且并不是随随便便报告给什么人，而是报告给总督本人的私人代理人。弗拉迪姆·托卡拉从一开始就很清楚这批货的事情，他打算把这批货物据为己有，如果顺利的话，还可以顺便把婕伊除掉。看得出来，这就是冷市商人之间肮脏、卑鄙的斗争。如果不是因为你临时起意，在酒吧和婕伊达成了交易，弗拉迪姆此刻说不定已经得逞了。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It is too great a coincidence that the Liege's representative should arrive in the Shadow Quarters just after Jae has recovered her rightful spoils. It seems that the guards reported the problems with the shipment over the vox, and not to just anyone, but to the Liege's personal agent. Vladaym Tocara knew about the shipment from the start and planned to take it for himself, and get rid of Jae if he could. Behold — the grubby, underhanded struggle between Cold Traders. And had it not been for your impromptu deal struck in the bar, Vladaym might have succeeded.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Es demasiada coincidencia que el representante del Señor llegue a los barrios bajos justo cuando Jae ha recuperado su botín. Parece que los guardias han dado parte por voco del cargamento, y no a cualquiera sino al agente personal del Señor. Vladaym Tocara era consciente del cargamento desde el primer momento y pensaba apropiarse de él y, de paso, si podía, librarse de Jae. Así de sucios y enrevesados son los conflictos del Comercio Frío. Y de no ser por un trato improvisado, acordado en un bar, Vladaym habría conseguido lo que se proponía.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It is too great a coincidence that the Liege's representative should arrive in the Shadow Quarters just after Jae has recovered her rightful spoils. It seems that the guards reported the problems with the shipment over the vox, and not to just anyone, but to the Liege's personal agent. Vladaym Tocara knew about the shipment from the start and planned to take it for himself, and get rid of Jae if he could. Behold — the grubby, underhanded struggle between Cold Traders. And had it not been for your impromptu deal struck in the bar, Vladaym might have succeeded.{/n}

Parece que los guardias han dado parte por voco del cargamento, y no a cualquiera sino al agente personal del Señor. Vladaym Tocara era consciente del cargamento desde el primer momento y pensaba apropiarse de él y, de paso, si podía, librarse de Jae. Así de sucios y enrevesados son los conflictos del Comercio Frío. Y de no ser por un trato improvisado, acordado en un bar, Vladaym habría conseguido lo que se proponía.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ジェイが戦利品を取り戻した直後に、領主の代理人がシャドウクォーターに到着するとは、偶然にしてはできすぎている。警備兵が貨物の問題をヴォクスで報告していたようだが、それは誰かに対してではなく、領主の個人的なエージェントに対してだったのだろう。ヴラダイム・トカラは最初からこの貨物のことを知っていて、自分のものにしつつ、可能ならジェイを追い出そうとしていたわけだ。これぞまさに、闇商人同士の卑劣にして卑怯な争いといえよう。あなたがバーで交わした取引がなければ、ヴラダイムは成功していたかもしれない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It is too great a coincidence that the Liege's representative should arrive in the Shadow Quarters just after Jae has recovered her rightful spoils. It seems that the guards reported the problems with the shipment over the vox, and not to just anyone, but to the Liege's personal agent. Vladaym Tocara knew about the shipment from the start and planned to take it for himself, and get rid of Jae if he could. Behold — the grubby, underhanded struggle between Cold Traders. And had it not been for your impromptu deal struck in the bar, Vladaym might have succeeded.{/n}

{n}ジェイが戦利品を取り戻した直後に、領主の代理人がシャドウクォーターに到着するとは、偶然にしてはできすぎている。警備兵が貨物の問題をヴォクスで報告していたようだが、それは誰かに対してではなく、領主の個人的なエージェントに対してだったのだろう。ヴラダイム・トカラは最初からこの貨物のことを知っていて、自分のものにしつつ、可能ならジェイを追い出そうとしていたわけだ。これぞまさに、闇商人同士の卑劣にして卑怯な争いといえよう。あなたがバーで交わした取引がなければ、ヴラダイムは成功していたかもしれない。{/n}

languages.text: {n}L'arrivée du représentant du suzerain dans le Quartier des Ombres juste après que Jae a récupéré ses marchandises ne peut pas être une coïncidence. Il semblerait que les gardes aient signalé les problèmes de cargaison par vox, et pas à n'importe qui, mais directement à l'agent personnel du suzerain. Vladaym Tocara était au courant pour la cargaison depuis le début et comptait s'en emparer en se débarrassant de Jae au passage, preuve s'il en faut que les adeptes du Commerce Froid n'ont aucun scrupule. Sans le marché impromptu que vous avez conclu au bar, Vladaym aurait très certainement réussi son coup.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It is too great a coincidence that the Liege's representative should arrive in the Shadow Quarters just after Jae has recovered her rightful spoils. It seems that the guards reported the problems with the shipment over the vox, and not to just anyone, but to the Liege's personal agent. Vladaym Tocara knew about the shipment from the start and planned to take it for himself, and get rid of Jae if he could. Behold — the grubby, underhanded struggle between Cold Traders. And had it not been for your impromptu deal struck in the bar, Vladaym might have succeeded.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}L'arrivée du représentant du suzerain dans le Quartier des Ombres juste après que Jae a récupéré ses marchandises ne peut pas être une coïncidence. Il semblerait que les gardes aient signalé les problèmes de cargaison par vox, et pas à n'importe qui, mais directement à l'agent personnel du suzerain. Vladaym Tocara était au courant pour la cargaison depuis le début et comptait s'en emparer en se débarrassant de Jae au passage, preuve s'il en faut que les adeptes du Commerce Froid n'ont aucun scrupule. Sans le marché impromptu que vous avez conclu au bar, Vladaym aurait très certainement réussi son coup.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Es ist ein zu großer Zufall, dass der Vertreter des Lehnsherren gerade dann in den Schattenquartieren auftaucht, als Jae ihre rechtmäßige Beute zurückerlangt hat. Die Wachen haben die Probleme mit der Lieferung offenbar über das Vox-System gemeldet, und zwar nicht irgendjemandem, sondern dem persönlichen Agenten des Lehnsherren. Vladaym Tocara wusste von Anfang an von der Lieferung und wollte sie sich unter den Nagel reißen und Jae wenn möglich loswerden. So läuft der schmierige, hinterhältige Kampf zwischen Kalthändlern. Und ohne Eure spontan in der Bar eingegangene Abmachung hätte Vladaym vielleicht Erfolg gehabt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It is too great a coincidence that the Liege's representative should arrive in the Shadow Quarters just after Jae has recovered her rightful spoils. It seems that the guards reported the problems with the shipment over the vox, and not to just anyone, but to the Liege's personal agent. Vladaym Tocara knew about the shipment from the start and planned to take it for himself, and get rid of Jae if he could. Behold — the grubby, underhanded struggle between Cold Traders. And had it not been for your impromptu deal struck in the bar, Vladaym might have succeeded.{/n}

Vladaym Tocara wusste von Anfang an von der Lieferung und wollte sie sich unter den Nagel reißen und Jae wenn möglich loswerden. So läuft der schmierige, hinterhältige Kampf zwischen Kalthändlern. Und ohne Eure spontan in der Bar eingegangene Abmachung hätte Vladaym vielleicht Erfolg gehabt.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Jae meşru ganimetlerini geri alır almaz Emîr'in temsilcisinin Gölge Mahalli'nde bitmesi çok büyük bir tesadüf. Anlaşılan muhafızlar, sevkiyatla ilgili sorunları voks ile bildirmiş. Üstelik tek bir merciye de değil, Emîr'in şahsi hizmetkârına ulaşmışlar. Vladaym Tocara, başından beri sevkiyattan haberdarmış ve sevkiyata el koymayı, fırsat olursa da Jae'dan kurtulmayı planlıyormuş. Soğuk Tacirler arasındaki pis, sinsi mücadelenin harika bir örneğiyle karşı karşıyasın. Barda bir anda yaptığın anlaşma olmasaydı Vladaym amacına ulaşırmış.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It is too great a coincidence that the Liege's representative should arrive in the Shadow Quarters just after Jae has recovered her rightful spoils. It seems that the guards reported the problems with the shipment over the vox, and not to just anyone, but to the Liege's personal agent. Vladaym Tocara knew about the shipment from the start and planned to take it for himself, and get rid of Jae if he could. Behold — the grubby, underhanded struggle between Cold Traders. And had it not been for your impromptu deal struck in the bar, Vladaym might have succeeded.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Emîr'in adamının, Jae meşru ganimetlerini geri aldıktan hemen sonra Gölge Mahali'ne gelmesi fazla büyük bir tesadüf. Anlaşılan muhafızlar sevkiyatla ilgili sorunları voks ile bildirmiş, öyle tek bir merciye de değil Emîr'in şahsi yardımcısına bildirmişler. Vladaym Tocara, başından beri sevkiyattan haberdardı ve sevkiyatı kendisi sahiplenmeyi, fırsat olursa da Jae'dan kurtulmayı planlıyordu. Karşında Soğuk Tacirler arasındaki pis, sinsi mücadelenin harika bir örneği duruyor. Barda doğaçlama yaptığın anlaşma olmasaydı Vladaym başarıya ulaşacaktı.{/n}
